FIELDS.title: Depart from DCA
FIELDS.subtitle: Flight leaves from DC at 09:35. Transfer at Toronto. 15:35 arrive at Haneda Airport.

FIELDS.title: Go Home!
FIELDS.subtitle: Takes about 3 hours to get from Fudou-in to KIX.  Flight leaves from Osaka KIX at 16:25. Take the bus back to Osaka from Koyasan.
